summary: BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces multiple new frontend components and backend APIs (auth/profile/phone availability, UI theming, splash screen integration, etc.) that were not requested in the provided BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new multi-step “WhatsApp-style” authentication/profile setup dialog (phone entry -> verify -> profile) including image upload/preview and toast errors.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so this functionality was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified backend to store and manage user profiles (full name, phone number, optional profile picture), including authorization checks, querying profiles, listing all profiles/phone numbers, checking phone number availability, and uploading a profile picture.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so backend profile/phone APIs were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated the application shell to wire auth dialog state, render the new auth dialog, and add Sonner toast notifications.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so this integration work was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed the header to be auth-aware: shows Sign In, profile loading indicator, avatar/name display, or “Complete Profile” based on authentication/profile state.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so these UI behavior changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified landing page CTAs to open the auth dialog (e.g., “Get Started”).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so landing page wiring changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified profile registration/editor dialog (including optional password fields and profile picture handling).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so this dialog was not requested.
